backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access control, blob storage mixins, user profiles, and typed maps for storing videos, audio, music, and scene configs with related metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme styling defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout with header/footer, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AvatarSetup.tsx: Avatar management UI for uploading, validating, registering, assigning, and deleting GLB avatars with related hooks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, branding, and attribution using navigate buttons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the site header with branding, navigation menus, theme toggle, and auth‑aware links.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Shows a modal for new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/PromptConfigCont: Provides UI controls for selecting generation provider, duration, aspect ratio, and style preset.
frontend/src/components/Scene3D.tsx: Renders a Three.js scene with lighting, camera, and a virtual actor or placeholder mesh based on emotion and gestures.
frontend/src/components/ScenePreview.tsx: Manages 3D scene preview, emotion analysis, video recording, upload flow, and playback controls for generated scenes.
frontend/src/components/TextInput.tsx: A text input card that handles prompt entry, validation, example prompts, and triggers preview or full video generation with Internet Identity checks.
frontend/src/components/VideoLibrary.tsx: Displays the user's videos, loads video blobs, handles download and error states, and links to the editor using Internet Identity and backend queries.
frontend/src/components/VirtualActor.tsx: Renders a GLTF-based virtual actor with gesture and emotion animation logic using morph targets and animation mixers in Three.js.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing identity loading, login, logout, and related status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating videos, audio, music, scene configs, and related backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Root React entry that initializes React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with input fields, styled UI components, and a toast on submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePage.tsx: Video creation page managing text prompts, generation states, and preview via ScenePreview and TextInput.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard showing video statistics, recent activity, and quick actions, gated by identity login.
frontend/src/pages/EditorPage.tsx: Video editor view showing video preview, parsed scene config, and placeholder editing controls.
frontend/src/pages/ExamplesPage.tsx: Showcases example video concepts with categories, descriptions, and visual preview cards.
frontend/src/pages/FeaturesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of feature cards describing the platform’s capabilities with icons, gradients, and styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero section, feature list, use cases, pricing highlights, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Shows the user’s video library with a heading and embedded VideoLibrary component.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Presents pricing plans in styled cards with features, pricing details, and navigation to the creation page.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Displays the full privacy policy inside a styled card with sections on data use, rights, and security.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings for profile, preferences, and provider selection with dynamic state and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Shows the Terms of Service with structured legal sections inside a styled card.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGenerator.tsx: Main UI for creating videos, managing text input, preview/generation states, provider selection, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/utils/emotionProvider.ts: Manages emotion-analysis provider options and persistence using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/emotionTimeline.ts: Generates emotion timelines and gesture cues from emotion analysis for animation.
frontend/src/utils/generationErrors.ts: Normalizes various generation-related errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/generationProvider.ts: Defines video generation providers and handles persistence, validation, and availability checks.
frontend/src/utils/generationSettings.ts: Defines generation settings, defaults, presets, validation, and resolution utilities.
frontend/src/utils/mediaRecorder.ts: Utility for recording canvas to video using MediaRecorder, with MIME support checks and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/sceneEmotionClassifie: Rule-based classifier that derives emotion, intensity, energy, and mood from input text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom color themes, container settings, and extended styles.
project_state.json: Stores the project's current state, including feature definitions and a pending request for sample preview generation.
